content: I have strong reasons to believe that my son Sérgio Melo has registered at Tatoeba today, Sunday, May 11 2014, as member number 20,000.
translations: ita:Ho forti ragioni per credere che mio figlio Sérgio Melo è registrato su Tatoeba oggi, domenica, 11 maggio 2014, come mem
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
